text: مُهْطِعِينَ مُقْنِعِى رُءُوسِهِمْ لَا يَرْتَدُّ إِلَيْهِمْ طَرْفُهُمْ ۖ وَأَفْـِٔدَتُهُمْ هَوَآءٌ

translation.en.sahih: Racing ahead, their heads raised up, their glance does not come back to them, and their hearts are void.
translation.id.indonesian: mereka datang bergegas-gegas memenuhi panggilan dengan mangangkat kepalanya, sedang mata mereka tidak berkedip-kedip dan hati mereka kosong.
